explains: n. （河流的）汇流点；（人或物的）聚集，合并

sentences.en: The 160-metre falls mark the dramatic confluence of the rivers Nera and Velino.
sentences.cn: 这处160米的瀑布是维拉河和维里诺河壮观的汇合处的标志。

sentences.en: We approached the confluence at the perfect speed.
sentences.cn: 我们以恰到好处的速度来到汇流处。

sentences.en: It was triggered by a confluence of flaky rumours.
sentences.cn: 抢盐恐慌由片状谣言合流而引发。
